category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AW_FTSIndexer_skip_modifications_via_relations
preference.preference_description: Controls whether the modification through relation queries can be done or not during the "TcFTSIndexer" sync process. This preference should be set to false if alternate id on Item is being indexed in Active Workspace. The default value is true.
